snippet: The following are selected comments and responses from the About New York column this week on Rory Staunton, a 12-year-old Queens boy who died on April 1 of septic shock.
lead_paragraph: The following are selected comments and responses from the About New York column this week on Rory Staunton, a 12-year-old Queens boy who died on April 1 of septic shock.
